verses.content: Keiin Krista ka entawn angtak hin, nangni khawmin mi entawn ve ro.
Iengkima in mi hriet zing lei le, thurosiehai ka hung hril angtaka in la vawng tlat leiin kân pâk cheu a nih.
Nisienlakhawm, pasal taphawt lu chu Krista a na, nuhmei lu chu a pasal a na, chun Krista lu chu Pathien a nih, ti in hrietchieng ka nuom a nih.
Pasal tukhawm, lukhum khum puma ṭawngṭai amani, thuhril amani phawt chun, ama lu chu a sukmuolpho a nih.
Amiruokchu, nuhmei tukhawm, lu inkhum lova ṭawngṭai amani, thu a hril amani chun, a lu a sukmuolpho a nih, ama chu a lu mêt kawl leh thuhmun a nih.
Nuhmeiin a lu ân khum si naw chun, a sam chu tan tâwi lem el raw se; nisienlakhawm, nuhmei ta dingin sam tan amani, mêt kawl amani chu thil inzakum a ni si leiin, a lu inkhum raw se.
Pasal ruok chu Pathien angpui le a ropuina a ni leiin, a lu ân khum ding a ni nawh a, nuhmei ruok chu pasal ropuina suklangtu a nih.
Pasal hi nuhmeia inthawka siem a ni nawh a, nuhmei ruok chu pasala inthawka siem a ni lem sih a.
Pasal hi nuhmei ta dinga siem a ni nawh a, nuhmei ruok chu pasal ta dinga siem a nih.
Vântirkohai leiin, nuhmei chu a pasal thuhnuoia um a nih ti inchikna dingin a lu ân khum ding a nih.
Nisienlakhawm, Lalpaa chun nuhmei hi pasal ṭhang lovin a um thei nawh a, pasal khawm nuhmei ṭhang lovin a um thei bawk nawh.
Nuhmei hi pasala inthawka siem a ni ang bawk hin, pasal khawm chu nuhmeia inthawka pieng a ni sih a; nisienlakhawm, thil po po hi Pathiena inthawka suok vawng an nih.
Nangni ngei khan ngaituo hman ro: Nuhmeiin a lu inkhum lova Pathien kuoma a ṭawngṭai hi a âwm rêng rêng am a ni?
Pasalin sam sei a put chun, a ta dingin thil inzakum a nih ti in piengpui lungril khawmin ân hriettir naw cheu am a ni?
Nuhmeiin a sam a hla sei ruok chun, chu chu ama ropuina a nih, a sam chu inkhumna dinga pêk a ni sih a.
Tukhawmin, hi thu hi a lo sêl a ni khawmin, chuong thila chun keinîn thawdân kan nei nawh a, Pathien kohranhai khawma an nei bawk nawh.
Amiruokchu, hieng thil inchûktirnahaia hin chu kân pâk thei naw cheu a nih, in inkhâwm pha ṭhatpui nêkin in sietpui lem hlak leiin.
A hmasatakin, kohran anga in inkhâwm chângin nangni lai inṭhena a um hlak ti thu ka lo hriet sih a; iemani chenah ka ring deu bawk a nih.
Nangni laia mi indiktakhai an inlang theina dingin pâwl tum tum an hung um ding hrim a nih.
In fe khâwm phaa in fâk hlak hi, Lalpa zânbu a ni naw tawp el.
Fâk hun a tlung pha leh, mi tinin mani bu seng in lo fâk el hlak sih a, chuongchun pakhat phîngṭâmin a um a, pakhat ân rui hlak.

Ieng am an ta leh! Fâk le dâwnna dingin in in nei seng an naw am a ni? Annawleh, Pathien kohran hmusitin, iengkhawm nei nawhai chu in sukzak el hlak am a ni? In kuomah ieng am ka hril ding a na? Kân pâk ding cheu am a ni? Hi thila hin chun kân pâk thei naw cheu.
Ka thu hril sâwng cheu kha Lalpa kuoma inthawka ka dawng a na; khânga inmantira a um zân khan, Lalpa Isûn, bei a lâk a,
lâwmthu a hril zovin, a khawi a, “Hi hi ka taksa, in ta ding chu a nih. In mi hriet zingna dingin hi hi thaw hlak ro,” a ti kha.
Chuong ang bawkin, zânbu fâk zovin, no khawm chu a lâk a, “Hi hi ka thisena Thuthlung Thar chu a nih. In dâwn povin in mi hriet zingna dingin thaw hlak ro,” a ti kha.
Chu bei chu in fâk a, no chu in dâwn zâtin, Lalpa hung nâwk hmakhat a thina chu in puong hlak a ni sih a.
Chuleiin, tukhawm tlâklo puma bei chu faa, Lalpa no chu dâwn taphawt chun, Lalpa taksa le thisen chungah suol-maw phur a tih.
Mi tin mani infie seng sienla, chuong ang chun bei chu fain no chu dâwn raw se.
A fatu le a dâwntu chun, Lalpa taksa chîktaka a ngaituo si naw chun, ama chunga rorêlna intlun dingin a fâkin a dâwn a ni sih a.
Hi lei hin nangni laia tamtak chu, in hrâtnawin in hrivawi a sie a nih, ṭhenkhat chu in thi tah a.
Amiruokchu, chîktakin inngaituo hlak unla chu, ro rêlpêkin ei um naw ding bah.
Rorêlpêka ei um khawmin, khawvêl mihai anga thiemnaw changa ei um nawna dingin Lalpa thununin ei um hlak a nih.
Chuleiin, ka unauhai, fa dinga in inkhâwm pha, innghâk tâwl hlak ro.
In inkhâwm chu thiemnaw in chang phana a ni nawna dingin, a phîngṭâm chun inah hung fa zet raw se. Thil danghai chungchâng chu ka hung pha leh la kâwkhmûng ka ti cheu.
